authFailures.title: Authentication Failures
authFailures.description: Recent failed authentication and API key events (admin only).
authFailures.unauthorized: You don't have permission to view authentication audit logs.

auth.welcomeMessage: Monitor and protect your systems in real-time
auth.resetPasswordInstructions: Enter your email to receive a password reset link.
auth.resetPasswordSuccess: Password reset email sent. Please check your inbox.

securityCenter.subtitle: Unify your Alerts and Threat Log in one place.

clearAllConfirmation.title: Are you sure you want to clear all alerts?
clearAllConfirmation.description: This action cannot be undone. All alerts, both read and unread, will be permanently deleted.

active.message: You have an active subscription. Manage your billing, update payment method, or cancel anytime.

success.title: Payment Successful!
success.description: Your subscription is now active. Welcome to SentinelScope!

error.title: Error
error.billingPortal: Failed to open billing portal. Please try again.

checkout.title: Complete Your Subscription
checkout.subtitle: Secure checkout powered by Stripe
checkout.cardDescription: Enter your payment information to activate your subscription
checkout.terms: By confirming your subscription, you allow SentinelScope to charge your card for this payment and future payments in accordance with our terms. You can cancel at any time.

error.title: Payment Failed
error.payment: Payment failed. Please check your card details and try again.
error.init: Failed to initialize checkout. Please try again or contact support.

mfa.title: Multi-Factor Authentication
mfa.description: Add an extra layer of security to your account.
mfa.enrollDescription: Enter your phone number to receive a verification code.

totp.title: Authenticator (TOTP)
totp.description: Use an authenticator app (e.g., 1Password, Authy, Google Authenticator) for stronger MFA security.
totp.scanInstruction: Scan this QR code with your authenticator app, then enter the 6-digit code.

recovery.title: Recovery Codes
recovery.description: Store these codes in a secure password manager. Each code can be used once if you lose access to your authenticator.
recovery.initialOnly: Codes generated during initial verification are shown only once.

disable.title: Disable TOTP
disable.description: Enter a current TOTP code OR a valid unused recovery code to disable.

mfa.lockedNotice: Too many failed attempts. Locked until {{time}}.
mfa.footerNote: Authenticator secrets are encrypted at rest. Lockout after 5 failed attempts for 5 minutes.
mfa.phoneComingSoon: Phone/SMS factor coming soon (feature flag enabled).

webauthn.title: Security Keys (WebAuthn)
webauthn.description: Register a hardware key or platform authenticator.
webauthn.unsupported: WebAuthn requires a secure context (https) and a compatible browser.
webauthn.warningSignCount: Potential cloned authenticator detected (sign count anomaly).

privacy.title: Privacy & Data Collection
privacy.description: Control how we monitor and protect your network activity
privacy.browsingMonitoringDesc: Allow SentinelScope to monitor your network activity for threats (DNS queries, connections)
privacy.browsingHistoryDesc: Also collect browser history for comprehensive threat detection (requires explicit consent)
privacy.dataRetentionDesc: How long to keep browsing activity data
privacy.privacyNoteText: HTTPS sites: Only domain names are collected (not full URLs). All data is encrypted and used solely for threat detection. You can delete your data anytime.
privacy.consentRequired: By enabling browser history collection, you explicitly consent to the collection and processing of your browsing data in accordance with GDPR/LGPD regulations.

deleteAccount.title: Delete Account
deleteAccount.description: Permanently delete your account and all associated data. This action cannot be undone.
deleteAccount.dialogDescription: This will permanently delete your account, subscription, and all associated data. To confirm, please enter your password.

challenge.enterTotp: Enter the 6-digit code from your authenticator app.
challenge.locked: Too many failed attempts. Locked until {{time}}.

enrollStarted.title: TOTP Enrollment Started
enrollStarted.desc: Scan the QR with your authenticator app.

disabled.title: TOTP Disabled
disabled.desc: Multi-factor authentication has been turned off.

recoveryUsed.title: Recovery Code Used
recoveryUsed.desc: MFA challenge satisfied via recovery code.

disabled.title: Phone MFA Disabled
disabled.desc: SMS factor has been turned off.

virustotal.title: VirusTotal Scanner
virustotal.description: Scan files, URLs, and IP addresses for malware

scan.hashDescription: Enter a file hash (MD5, SHA-1, or SHA-256) to check against VirusTotal database
scan.urlDescription: Enter a URL to check for malicious content or phishing
scan.ipDescription: Enter an IP address to check its reputation

admin.manageUsers: Manage all users and their subscriptions
admin.editUserDescription: Update user subscription and admin status
admin.grantAdminAccess: Grant admin access to this user
admin.reviewThreatDescription: Decide whether to block or allow this threat. Your decision will be logged for audit purposes.
admin.threatDecisionSuccess: Your threat decision has been recorded successfully
admin.bulkImportDescription: Upload a CSV file to add multiple IPs to the blocklist at once.
admin.csvFormatInstructions: The CSV file must have 'ip_address' and 'reason' columns. The header row is required.
admin.decisionHistoryDescription: View all administrative decisions made for this threat
admin.noDecisionHistory: No decision history available for this threat

eventSources.title: Event Sources
eventSources.description: Configure security event data sources for real-time monitoring. You can rotate API keys with a grace window and force-expire rotations when needed.
eventSources.createDescription: Add a new event source to collect security events from your infrastructure
eventSources.noSourcesDescription: Create your first event source to start receiving real-time security events

install.title: Installation Guide
install.description: Step-by-step instructions to install and configure SentinelScope monitoring agents on your systems
install.step1Description: Sign up for SentinelScope and choose a subscription plan that fits your needs
install.step2Description: Navigate to Event Sources and create a new source to get your API key
install.step3Description: Follow the instructions below for your operating system
install.apiKeyDescription: You'll need an API key to connect your monitoring agents to SentinelScope
install.apiStep1: Navigate to the Event Sources page from the sidebar
install.apiStep2: Click 'Create Event Source' and choose 'Agent' as the source type
install.apiStep3: Give your source a descriptive name (e.g., 'Office Laptop' or 'Production Server')
install.apiStep4: Copy the API key displayed after creation (shown only once!)
install.apiKeyWarning: Important: Copy and save your API key securely. It will only be shown once during creation.
install.installationDescription: Choose your operating system and follow the step-by-step instructions
install.windowsDescription: Open PowerShell as Administrator and run the following commands:
install.macDescription: Open Terminal and run the following commands:
install.linuxDescription: Open Terminal and run the following commands:
install.configureAgent: Configure the agent with your API key
install.installSystemd: Install and start the systemd service
install.verifyDescription: After installation, verify that your agent is sending data:
install.verifyStep1: Wait 2-3 minutes for the agent to start collecting data
install.verifyStep2: Navigate to the Event Sources page and check the 'Last Heartbeat' status
install.verifyStep3: Go to the Threat Log page to see detected security events
install.troubleNoEvents: Agent installed but not seeing events?
install.troubleCheckApiKey: Double-check that your API key is correct
install.troubleCheckFirewall: Verify your firewall allows outbound HTTPS connections
install.troubleCheckService: Check that the agent service is running
install.troubleRunAsAdmin: Make sure you're running commands as Administrator/root
install.troubleCheckPermissions: Check file permissions on the agent executable

hero.title: Protecting Digital Assets Since 2024
hero.description: SentinelScope is a next-generation cybersecurity monitoring platform designed to detect, analyze, and neutralize threats in real-time. Our mission is to make enterprise-grade security accessible to organizations of all sizes.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.content: We believe that every organization deserves access to world-class cybersecurity tools. SentinelScope democratizes enterprise-grade threat intelligence by providing real-time monitoring, advanced analytics, and actionable insights at an affordable price. Our platform combines cutting-edge technology with intuitive design, empowering security teams to stay ahead of evolving cyber threats.

security.title: Security First
security.description: We prioritize the security and privacy of your data above all else, implementing industry-leading encryption and security practices.

customer.title: Customer-Centric
customer.description: Our customers are at the heart of everything we do. We build solutions that solve real-world cybersecurity challenges.

innovation.title: Innovation
innovation.description: We continuously innovate to stay ahead of emerging threats and provide cutting-edge threat intelligence.

excellence.title: Excellence
excellence.description: We strive for excellence in every aspect of our platform, from threat detection to customer support.

team.title: Our Team
team.securityDesc: Former security researchers from leading cybersecurity firms with decades of combined experience.
team.engineeringDesc: Building scalable, real-time monitoring systems that process millions of events per day.
team.supportDesc: Dedicated support professionals ready to help you protect your digital assets around the clock.

cta.title: Ready to Secure Your Digital Assets?
cta.description: Join thousands of organizations protecting their infrastructure with SentinelScope.

hero.title: SentinelScope Blog
hero.description: Insights, tutorials, and best practices for cybersecurity professionals.

post1.title: 10 Essential Cybersecurity Best Practices for 2025
post1.excerpt: Learn the critical security measures every organization should implement to protect against modern cyber threats.

post2.title: Understanding Real-Time Threat Detection
post2.excerpt: How real-time monitoring can help you detect and respond to threats before they cause damage to your infrastructure.

post3.title: SOC2 Compliance Made Simple
post3.excerpt: A comprehensive guide to achieving SOC2 compliance with SentinelScope's built-in audit logging and reporting.

post4.title: Case Study: Blocking 10,000 Threats in One Week
post4.excerpt: How a mid-sized enterprise used SentinelScope to identify and neutralize a coordinated attack campaign.

post5.title: VirusTotal Integration: Leveraging Global Threat Intelligence
post5.excerpt: Discover how SentinelScope's VirusTotal integration provides instant malware analysis for files, URLs, and IPs.

post6.title: Event Source Management: Unified Security Monitoring
post6.excerpt: Learn how to consolidate logs from syslog, REST APIs, agents, and webhooks into a single monitoring dashboard.

newsletter.title: Stay Updated
newsletter.description: Subscribe to our newsletter for the latest cybersecurity insights and product updates.

hero.title: Join Our Mission to Secure the Digital World
hero.description: We're building the future of cybersecurity monitoring. Join a team of passionate engineers, designers, and security experts making the internet safer for everyone.

benefits.title: Why Work With Us?
benefits.health: Comprehensive health, dental, and vision insurance
benefits.pto: Unlimited PTO and flexible working hours

security.description: Build and maintain threat detection algorithms and security infrastructure.

fullstack.description: Develop scalable web applications with React, TypeScript, and Node.js.

analyst.description: Monitor threats, investigate incidents, and provide customer support.

designer.description: Design intuitive interfaces for complex security monitoring tools.

devops.description: Manage infrastructure, CI/CD pipelines, and deployment automation.

csm.description: Help customers maximize value from SentinelScope and achieve their security goals.

cta.title: Don't See a Perfect Fit?
cta.description: We're always looking for talented individuals. Send us your resume and tell us how you can contribute.

hero.title: Get in Touch
hero.description: Have questions about SentinelScope? Our team is here to help you secure your digital assets.

form.title: Send Us a Message
form.name: Name
form.subject: Subject
form.successDesc: We'll get back to you within 24 hours.

hero.title: Security at Our Core
hero.description: We take security seriously. SentinelScope implements industry-leading security practices to protect your data and ensure the integrity of our threat monitoring platform.

https.title: HTTPS Encryption
https.description: All data transmitted between your browser and our servers is encrypted using TLS 1.3, the latest industry standard.

auth.title: Secure Authentication
auth.description: Firebase Authentication with Google OAuth 2.0 provides secure, industry-standard identity verification.

database.title: Database Security
database.description: PostgreSQL with encryption at rest, hosted on Neon's SOC2-compliant infrastructure with automatic backups.

audit.title: Audit Logging
audit.description: Comprehensive logging of all security events, data access, and configuration changes for compliance and forensics.

hashing.title: API Key Hashing
hashing.description: All API keys are hashed using SHA-256 and verified with timing-safe comparison to prevent timing attacks.

secrets.title: Secret Management
secrets.description: Environment variables managed securely via environment configuration (e.g., .env), never exposed in code or version control.

hero.title: Enterprise-Grade Compliance
hero.description: SentinelScope is built with compliance in mind. We implement rigorous security controls and audit procedures to meet the strictest industry standards.

networkActivity.title: Network Activity
networkActivity.description: Monitor and review your browsing history and network activity
networkActivity.filtersDescription: Filter your browsing history by domain, IP, browser, or date range
networkActivity.noFlowDataDescription: No normalized events have been recorded yet.
networkActivity.noDataDescription: Enable network monitoring in Settings to start collecting browsing activity data. Make sure you have given consent for data collection.
networkActivity.flaggedOnlyTooltip: Show only flagged browsing entries. This preference is saved to your account.
networkActivity.flaggedTooltip: This domain is flagged. Flagging highlights it and counts toward flagged stats.
networkActivity.flagDomainTooltip: Mark this domain as flagged to highlight it and include it in flagged stats.
